SELECT TRUNCATE((YEAR(NOW())-substr(u.userBirth,1,4))/10,0)*10 AS age ,COUNT(TRUNCATE((YEAR(NOW())-substr(u.userBirth,1,4))/10,0)*10) AS agecount FROM tbRsv AS r INNER JOIN tbUser AS u ON r.rsvUserId = u.userId WHERE
r.rsvStoreCode = #{storeCode} AND u.userJob != '(탈퇴)' AND
r.rsvStartDateTime >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND r.rsvStartDateTime < CURDATE()
GROUP BY age
